```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
# Read in the excel sheet data.

# Overall contains the general breakdown of the entire game, 
# by scores per set, as well as number of sets won by each team.

overall <- read_excel("raw_data/2016_USA_SERBIA_OVERALL.xlsx", 1) 

# US_Players contains the individual data of each player
# over the course of 5 sets.

US_Players <- read_excel("raw_data/US_PLAYERS_8_18_16.xlsx") 

# Serbia_Players reads in individual data of players on the
# Serbian team who played Team USA on 08-18-2016.
Serbia_Players <- read_excel("raw_data/SERBIA_PLAYERS_8_18_16.xlsx")
```
